plot: Pear takes advantage of Orange's gullibility and sends him off on a pointless quest, where he falls in with a group of lobotomized tennis balls that 40-Love his jokes and set him up as king! When he decides to join the "yellow oranges" as they volley into the tennis ball machine, Pear faults himself and launches a rescue mission with the rest of the fruit. But will they reach the court before Orange gets served up a sudden death?—Jennifer Skelly
